mapper.select: SELECT * from( SELECT CEIL(rownum/10) AS pageno , d.* from( SELECT r.REVIEW_TITLE ,r.REVIEW_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(r.review_comment_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') as REVIEW_COMMENT_TIME ,r.REVIEW_COUNT,r.MEMBER_ID ,m.MEMBER_NICK,NVL(rhate,0) AS rhate ,NVL(rlike,0) AS rlike, r.REVIEW_NO FROM REVIEW r JOIN MEMBER m ON r.MEMBER_ID =m.MEMBER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT rh.review_no AS rhno, count(*) AS rhate FROM REVIEW_HATE rh GROUP BY rh.REVIEW_NO) ON rhno=r.review_no LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT rl.review_no AS rlno, count(*) AS rlike FROM REVIEW_LIKE rl GROUP BY rl.REVIEW_NO) ON rlno=r.review_no ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC) d) WHERE pageno=#{pageNo}
